alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nance, northeastern Merrick and central Polk Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Silver Creek, or 22 miles southwest of Columbus, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Nance, northeastern Merrick and central Polk Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and east central Nebraska.
